Title: Company Culture
Description: Explore the heart of our company by delving into our culture. Learn about our mission, vision, and core values that guide us. Discover the journey of our company's history and the importance we place on customer relationships. Explore the diverse range of products, projects, and solutions that shape our identity. Together, these elements create a positive and unified workplace environment, defining who we are and how we work together.

Title: Organization Chart
Description: Gain insights into the structure of our organization through our Organization Chart. Understand the reporting lines, team structures, and the hierarchy that defines roles and responsibilities. This chart provides a visual representation of how different departments and teams are interconnected, fostering transparency and clarity within our organization.

Title: Policies and Procedures
Description: Discover our straightforward Policies and Procedures designed to make your experience here positive and clear. From your first day to everyday operations, we've outlined guidelines for a smooth work journey. Learn about our expectations for attendance, leaves, remote work, and more. Find details on reimbursement, resource approvals, inventory requests, and our referral process. When it's time to move on, our exit process ensures a seamless transition. These guidelines ensure a harmonious and well-regulated workplace for everyone.

Title: Processes
Description: Explore the various processes that keep our organization running smoothly. From leave requests and WFH procedures to resource and inventory requests, understand the steps involved in these crucial aspects. Dive into the intricacies of access requests, sprint processes, and quality approvals, all of which contribute to our efficient workflow. These processes are designed to enhance collaboration, productivity, and the overall effectiveness of our team.

Title: Performance Appraisals
Description: Discover how we acknowledge and celebrate your accomplishments through our straightforward approach to performance appraisals. We work together to set and measure goals, ensuring your contributions are recognized and rewarded. At our organization, performance appraisals are a reflection of your success and an opportunity for ongoing growth.

Title: Standards
Description: Explore our dedication to upholding high standards across different facets of our operations. Delve into the introduction of ISO Standards, understanding their significance in ensuring excellence. Learn about the ISO Quality Management System and the detailed processes for document control and record-keeping. Uncover our internal auditing procedures, showcasing our commitment to continuous improvement within our standards. At our organization, standards form the bedrock of our pursuit of excellence.

Title: Architecture
Description: Discover the vibrant side of life at Bluescope through our Events and Activities. Engage in team-building events that strengthen bonds and participate in employee recognition programs that celebrate achievements. At Bluescope, we believe in fostering a positive and collaborative environment by creating memorable experiences that go beyond work, promoting camaraderie and a sense of belonging within our team. Join us in valuing the moments that make Bluescope more than just a workplace.

Title: Effective Communication Skills
Description: Explore the importance of Effective Communication Skills at Bluescope. Learn about verbal and written communication techniques that enhance connectivity within our team. Discover active listening techniques that foster collaboration, and master professional email etiquette to ensure clear and respectful communication. At Bluescope, we believe that effective communication is the cornerstone of our success, enabling seamless collaboration and a positive working environment.

Title: Critical Thinking and Problem Solving
Description: Enhance your skills to analyze situations and approach challenges strategically, fostering innovation and growth within our team.

Title: Presentation Skills
Description: Hone your ability to create engaging presentations and overcome public speaking anxiety, ensuring impactful communication within our dynamic team.

Title: Cross-Cultural Communication
Description: Navigate cultural differences, adapt communication styles, and promote global team collaboration, fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace environment.

Title: Basic IT and Digital Skills
Description: Develop proficiency in office software, understand digital tools, and raise cybersecurity awareness, ensuring a tech-savvy and secure work environment

Title: Ethics and Professionalism
Description: Uphold workplace ethics, exhibit professional conduct, and prioritize integrity in business practices, fostering a culture of trust and responsibility within our team.

Title: Effective Meeting Participation
Description: Master meeting etiquette, contribute to discussions, and follow up on action items, ensuring productive and collaborative sessions that drive results within our dynamic team.

Title: Leadership Basics
Description: Understand leadership styles, motivate teams effectively, and lead by example, cultivating strong and inspiring leadership within our organization.

Title: Project Management Basics
Description: Gain an introduction to project management, master project planning and execution, and meet project deadlines efficiently, ensuring successful project outcomes within our dynamic team.

Title: Software Development Models
Description: Explore different software development models, including the Waterfall Model and Agile Methodology. Understand the principles, phases, advantages, and disadvantages, ensuring an informed approach to software development within our team.

Title: Process Improvement
Description: Embrace the Capability Maturity Model Integration (CMMI), understanding its levels, benefits, and application in software processes. Explore Six Sigma methodologies for continuous improvement, ensuring efficiency and excellence in our operational processes.

Title: Metrics and Measurement
Description: Dive into Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for software quality, monitoring and improving processes to ensure continuous enhancement and success within our dynamic team.

Title: QA & Testing
Description: Explore various types of testing, including unit testing, integration testing, and system testing. Understand the importance of test automation, and familiarize yourself with tools, frameworks, and test scripting and execution, ensuring the delivery of high-quality software solutions.

Title: Internet Basics
Description: Understand fundamental concepts such as DNS, domain names, hosting, HTTP, browsers, and their functionalities, providing a solid foundation for effective online navigation within our tech-savvy environment.

Title: Networking Basics & Protocols
Description: Grasp the essentials of networking, including the OSI model and TCP model. Understand network topologies, CSR, certificates, IP, DNS, and protocols like SSL, TLS, SSH, and file transfer. Empower yourself with knowledge to manage and troubleshoot networking effectively within our tech-driven environment.

Title: Security
Description: Safeguard our digital landscape by understanding network configuration, troubleshooting networking problems, and implementing firewalls, VPNs, and encryption. Ensure a secure and resilient digital environment within our organization.

Title: OS Fundamentals
Description: Explore the basics of operating systems, understanding their types, architecture, and algorithms. Acquire proficiency in UNIX basic commands, empowering yourself with essential skills for navigating our tech-driven environment.

Title: Data Science for beginners
Description: Delve into data science essentials covering data structures, data lifecycle, and the definition of data science. Acquire foundational knowledge crucial for navigating data-related tasks within our dynamic organization.

Title: Databases
Description: Explore the world of databases with an overview, basic select operations, aggregation, and basic join queries. Acquire essential skills for effective data management within our tech-driven environment.

Title: Git Essentials
Description: Master version control with Git, covering working remotely, feature branches, Gitflow workflow, and collaboration. Navigate the essentials of Git to ensure streamlined and efficient collaboration within our dynamic team at Bluescope.

Title: Fundamentals of Integration
Description: Understand the core principles of integration, ensuring seamless connections and interactions within our tech-driven environment. Explore the foundational aspects that contribute to effective integration practices at Bluescope.

Title: Postman in API Integration
Description: Dive into Postman to create and send API requests, organize requests with collections and environments, handle authentication, and collaborate effectively. Master the essentials of API integration to streamline and optimize processes within our dynamic tech environment at Bluescope.

Title: Remote Access
Description: Navigate remote access tools and practices to ensure seamless connectivity and collaboration, fostering a flexible and efficient work environment within our dynamic team

Title: File Transfer
Description: Master efficient file transfers with tools like WinSCP, configuring sessions for secure file transfers. Ensure smooth and secure file exchange within our tech-driven environment at Bluescope.

Title: DevOps Practices and CI/CD
Description: Explore the principles and practices of DevOps, including CI/CD pipelines and automation in software development. Understand the benefits and best practices of DevOps, ensuring a streamlined and efficient development process within our dynamic team.

Title: Powerbi
Description: Dive into the world of data visualization with PowerBI. Learn how to harness its capabilities for effective data analysis and reporting, empowering you to make informed decisions within our tech-driven environment at Bluescope.

Title: Visio
Description: Explore the versatile features of Microsoft Visio, empowering you to create insightful diagrams and visuals. Learn how to leverage Visio for effective communication and documentation within our dynamic tech environment at Bluescope.

Title: VS code editor
Description: Unleash the power of Visual Studio Code for efficient coding and development. Learn tips and tricks to enhance your productivity and streamline coding tasks within our dynamic tech environment at Bluescope.

Title: Markdown Language
Description: Master the simplicity and effectiveness of Markdown for document formatting. Learn to use Markdown to enhance collaboration and documentation within our tech-driven environment, making your content creation process more efficient at Bluescope.

Title: Cloud Computing
Description: Explore the principles and benefits of cloud computing, understanding its impact on our tech-driven environment. Learn how cloud services enhance flexibility, scalability, and efficiency within the operations at Bluescope.

Title: Mobile
Description: Navigate the mobile landscape, understanding its significance in our tech-driven environment. Explore how mobile technologies contribute to efficiency and connectivity within the operations at Bluescope.

Title: Cybersecurity
Description: Prioritize cybersecurity awareness, ensuring the protection of our digital assets. Explore best practices, tools, and strategies to maintain a secure digital environment within our tech-driven operations at Bluescope.

Title: Big Data
Description: Explore the realm of Big Data and its applications within our tech-driven environment. Understand how Big Data analytics contributes to informed decision-making and operational efficiency at Bluescope.

Title: AI and Machine Learning
Description: Delve into the transformative world of AI and Machine Learning. Understand their applications and impact within our tech-driven environment. Explore how these technologies contribute to innovation and efficiency at Bluescope.

Title: Outlook Quick Start
Description: Get started quickly with the Outlook Quick Start guide. Learn how to add an email account, create and send email, use @mentions, show Focused inbox, manage your calendar and contacts, schedule an appointment using Scheduling Assistant, add a contact, collaborate in Outlook, share a file, set up an online meeting and shared notes, and set up your mobile apps.

Title: Set up and customize Outlook
Description: Need to set up and customize Outlook? Learn how Outlook can help you organize your email, manage and share your calendar, share files, stay connected, and add an outlook.com account, Microsoft 365 email account, or Gmail account.

Title: Create and send email
Description: Learn how to create and send email in Outlook, create an email signature, send and receive attachments, and retract or replace a sent email. Watch this video training to see how.

Title: Manage email
Description: Learn how to manage your email in Outlook. Use Automatic Replies to auto-reply to messages, search and filter email, refine your searches, ignore conversations, and use Clean Up Conversation to clean up your inbox. Watch this video training to see how.

Title: Organize your inbox
Description: Learn tips to organize your inbox. Learn how to set a Follow Up flag, view or remove Follow Up flags, set a reminder, find an Action Item, create color categories, assign a color category to an email message, create a folder, move messages into a folder, add a folder to Favorites, or create a rule.

Title: Contacts and tasks in Outlook
Description: Keep track of your contacts and tasks in Outlook. Learn how to add a contact, create a contact group, import Gmail contacts, export contacts, and create tasks and a to-do list.

Title: Outlook Calendar
Description: Learn how to use your calendar in Outlook to organize your schedule. Switch your calendar view between day, week, or month, create appointments and meetings, schedule an online meeting, share your calendar, import calendars, search for calendar items, use color categories and reminders so you never miss an important meeting, and turn on Shared Calendar preview.

Title: Manage your inbox
Description: Manage your inbox in Outlook mobile. Learn how to play your emails, RSVP to invites instantly, swipe left and swipe right to manage your inbox, sort messages into Focused and Other to focus on what matters, and use Android widgets to access the tools you use all day, every day right from your Android home screen.

Title: Manage your time
Description: Use Outlook mobile to manage your time, schedule meetings, and see when everyone is available. Use the meeting location assistant, send meeting availability, share your calendar, merge and combine calendars, and manage your notifications. Learn the top 10 Outlook mobile tips.

Title: People and connections
Description: Use People and Connections in Outlook mobile to learn about contacts, scan contacts or add contacts. Use @mentions, favorite contacts and set notifications or add folders and groups to favorites.

Title: Search and share
Description: Learn how to search in Outlook mobile, share files and photos, search your calendar by title, subject, email address, or event description, and use the Search icon to find email attachments.

Title: Planner Quick Start
Description: Get started quickly with the Planner Quick Start. Learn how to sign in, create a plan, add people to a plan, set up buckets for tasks, add tasks, due dates, comments and attachments, view a plan’s progress and get email updates and notifications, and set up your mobile device to use Planner anywhere.

Title: Ideas for your board
Description: Get ideas for your board in Planner. Plan an event like a product launch, support customers, publish content, or track progress. See real life examples to get ideas for how you can use Planner.

Title: Use Planner
Description: Use Planner to organize your team, see progress reports, and track individual assignments. Learn how to build a plan, add buckets and tasks, assign tasks and due dates, and add a plan to Teams. Compare Planner to ToDo, use Schedule View to organize your tasks on a calendar and see your Planner schedule in Outlook calendar.

Title: PowerPoint Quick Start
Description: Get started quickly with the PowerPoint Quick Start guide. Create a presentation, add a slide, picture, shape, or chart, save to OneDrive, rename a presentation, use themes and PowerPoint Designer, add transitions and animations, share and collaborate with others, add comments, chat while editing, restore previous versions, use Presenter View and Notes, and set up your mobile apps.

Title: Intro to PowerPoint
Description: In this intro to PowerPoint course, learn how you can use PowerPoint to create presentations, add text, images, art, and videos, select a professional design with PowerPoint Designer, add transitions and animations, save to OneDrive to get to your files from anywhere, and share your work to collaborate with others.

Title: Slides and layouts
Description: Learn how to create slides and layouts in PowerPoint. Create a slide master, add, rearrange, duplicate and move slides, apply a slide layout, add color and design to your slides with themes, apply a template to a new presentation, get design ideas with PowerPoint Designer, and customize a slide master. Watch this video training to see how.

Title: Text & tables with PowerPoint
Description: Want to learn about text and tables with PowerPoint? Learn how to insert WordArt, add a hyperlink to a slide, create a PowerPoint presentation from an outline, check spelling in your presentation, create and format a table, insert a linked Excel chart, add slide numbers, date and time, and set the text direction and position in a shape or text box.

Title: Pictures and graphics with PowerPoint
Description: Add pictures and graphics in PowerPoint to make your presentation visually engaging. Learn how to insert a picture, apply an artistic effect, add SmartArt, add a background picture or company logo, add charts and graphs, or insert icons.

Title: Present slideshows
Description: Learn how to present slideshows in PowerPoint. Add speaker notes to your slides, rehearse the time and delivery, record a slide show with narration, print your slides, handouts, or notes, and create a self-running presentation.

Title: Animation, video & audio
Description: Add animation, video and audio in PowerPoint to make your presentation more engaging and professional. Add transitions between slides, animate text or objects, use the Morph transition, insert a video, add audio or music, and record your screen and embed it in your presentation.

Title: Share and coauthor with PowerPoint
Description: Share and coauthor with others in PowerPoint in real time. Work with comments, share your presentation, save a presentation as a video, inspect a presentation to remove personal and confidential information, or save a presentation as a PDF.

Title: SharePoint Online Quick Start
Description: Get started quickly with the Word Quick Start guide. Learn how to sign in to SharePoint, search and discover news and information, find your site, create a site, add a list or document library, use filters to modify what you see, add a page, add a web part, collaborate with others, open a document from a document library, share a document, sync files to your computer, and set up your mobile apps.

Title: Intro to SharePoint Online
Description: With this intro to SharePoint Online, learn how you can use SharePoint to build intranet sites, pages, document libraries and lists, find and follow sites and news, and stay connected on mobile. Watch this video training to see how.

Title: Create sites, posts, and lists
Description: Create sites, posts, and lists in SharePoint Online to connect your team or organization. Care a Team site or Communication site, explore news, activity, and documents on your site, use, filter, and update lists to keep your team on track, add or remove a news post, and create a page to communicate ideas or information to your team. Watch this video training to see how.

Title: Share and sync with SharePoint
Description: Create, share, and SharePoint files

Title: Sway Quick Start
Description: Create in Sway, Add Content, Design and Share, and Learn More

Title: Share and access Sway
Description: Learn how to share and access Sway. See how to share your Sway, add a password, set privacy settings, use accessibility features to make your Sway accessible, and learn Sway keyboard shortcuts.

Title: Add content to SWAY
Description: Learn how to add content to Sway. Import content into Sway, search for content, add video and audio files, embed an Office file, form, or other content in Sway, add Focus Points, copy and paste cards, and use QuickStarter to create a Sway quickly.

Title: Customize Sway
Description: Customize Sway to remove the Sway informational footer, use Administrator settings, see file size limits, and get answers to frequently asked questions and Admin help for Sway.

Title: Get started with Viva Connections
Description: Microsoft Viva Connections provides a personalized and actionable home base that allows you to complete daily employee tasks, stay connected to company news, and access resources—all without leaving your hub for teamwork.

Title: Get started with Viva Engage
Description: Building on Yammer, Viva Engage brings together leaders and coworkers across your organization, enabling them to answer each other's questions, share their unique stories, and create belonging at work, combining its communities, conversations, and personalized discovery with new capabilities for self-expression and sharing through storyline and stories.

Title: Communities
Description: Communities in Viva Engage provide a central place for your conversations, files, events, and updates. When you create a community, you automatically become an owner of that community.

Title: Storyline
Description: Start the conversation or join the ones around you through storyline in Viva Engage. Your storyline is where you share experiences, celebrate milestones, propose ideas, and discuss your interests both inside and outside of the workplace.

Title: Leadership
Description: Leadership corner in Viva Engage is a place to get to know your leaders and stay in the know. Catch up on the latest content your leaders are posting, discover the communities they've joined, and attend their AMAs to ask them questions directly. Leadership corner gives you the tools you need to learn about your leaders and build lasting connections with them.

Title: Answers in Viva
Description: Answers in Viva is a new experience for people in large organizations to learn from each other by asking and answering questions. Answers is a conversational experience for asking questions and connecting employees to crowdsourced answers.

Title: Campaigns
Description: Campaigns in Viva Engage are a way for you to get involved, share your voice, and build your community. You can participate in campaigns from anywhere in Viva Engage by posting with the verified campaign hashtag.

Title: Analytics
Description: Analytics in Viva Engage help you understand how your content performs and how to improve engagement in the future. View your analytics dashboard by selecting the analytics icon from the top navigation of Viva Engage.

Title: Viva Engage Mobile App
Description: As you'll notice, the Yammer app you love is now called Viva Engage and has all the features you need to keep you connected to your colleagues. To get started, go to your mobile device's app store and download Viva Engage.

Title: Get started with Viva Goals
Description: Microsoft Viva Goals aligns your organization’s strategic priorities and unites teams around common missions and purposes. In Get started with Viva Goals, learn how to create objectives, key results, and projects. Also learn how to check-in and update your progress, and score and reflect on your goals.

Title: Get started with Viva Learning
Description: Viva Learning creates a central hub for learning in Teams where people can share, recommend, and learn from content libraries across an organization to empower teams and individuals to make learning a natural part of their day. This includes access to content libraries from LinkedIn Learning, Microsoft Learn, Microsoft 365 Training, and third-party content providers and learning management systems, as well as content your company adds to Viva Learning.

Title: Word Quick Start
Description: Get started quickly with the Word Quick Start guide. Learn how to create a document, add and format text, add pictures, shapes, SmartArt, and charts, save your document to OneDrive, design and edit using styles and themes, check spelling and grammar, find and replace text, share your document, collaborate with others, track and review changes, and set up your mobile apps.

Title: Intro to Word
Description: With this intro to Word, see how to create a document and use word to review and track changes, improve your spelling, grammar, and writing with Editor, save your documents to OneDrive to get to your files from your computer, tablet, or phone, and share your work to chat, comment, and collaborate with others wherever they are.

Title: Write and edit
Description: Do your best writing in Microsoft Word. Learn how to add and edit text, find and replace text, check grammar and spelling, show word count, and insert and remove hyperlinks.

Title: Lay out pages
Description: There are several useful options to lay out pages with Word. Learn how to change margins, create newsletter columns, change page orientation, add a border to a page, insert a header or a footer, insert page numbers, and insert a page break.

Title: Insert tables, pictures, and watermarks
Description: Learn how to insert tables, pictures, and watermarks in Word. Create a table, add a picture, insert an icon and WordArt, show or hide the ruler, rotate a picture or shape, and wrap text around a picture.

Title: Save and print with Word
Description: Learn how to save and print in Word. Save a file to OneDrive so you can get to it from anywhere, convert or save a Word document to a PDF, edit a PDF, print your document, print an envelope, create and print labels, or print labels for your mailing list.

Title: Share and coauthor with Word
Description: Learn how to share and coauthor in Word. Share a document, collaborate with others on your Word documents, insert or delete a comment, track changes, review and accept tracked changes, and use word on a mobile device. Watch this video training to see how.

Title: Use Word for school
Description: Write an equation or formula in Word, indent a paragraph, insert lines, create a bibliography, and insert footnotes and endnotes

Title: Improve accessibility and ease of use with Word
Description: Learn how to improve accessibility and ease of use in Word. Use a screen reader, use Learning Tools to help with reading fluency and comprehension, use Accessibility Checker to make documents accessible, and learn keyboard shortcuts to perform tasks quickly.

Title: Format text
Description: Learn how to format text in Word. Change the font, font size, font color, copy formatting with Format Painter, create a bulleted or numbered list, change the line spacing, and apply styles and themes to visually enhance the design of your Word document.

Title: Yammer Quick Start
Description: Get started quickly with the Yammer Quick Start. Sign in to Yammer and join community conversations, find out what's trending in your organization, and set up the Yammer mobile app to use Yammer on the go.

Title: Roll out a successful Yammer network
Description: Follow these tips and best practices to roll out a successful Yammer network. Get an overview of Yammer, plan your strategy, personalize a Yammer network, identify the right use cases, create a community, prepare for launch, educate users, drive ongoing engagement, integrate Yammer into Teams, SharePoint Online and Outlook, and measure success.

Title: Use Yammer every day
Description: Learn how use Yammer every day to engage with people, leaders, and communities in your organization and share knowledge. Get an overview of Yammer, change your Yammer profile and settings, start a conversation, work with posts, attach files, discover and join communities, use notifications to stay connected, work with announcements, and learn tips and best practices to get the most out of Yammer.

Title: What's New, What's Changed
Description: Discover what's new/what's changed for the latest update of Microsoft 365 learning pathways

Title: Plan your learning content
Description: Review Learning Pathways content and content types. Decide what works for your organization.

Title: Customize learning pathways
Description: Learn how to customize the Learning Pathways site, how to hide and show content, and how to build custom playlists.

Title: Drive adoption
Description: Discover resources and best practices for driving adoption of Learning Pathways

Title: Measure impact
Description: Administrators should leverage SharePoint’s built-in site usage reporting capabilities to measure organizational impact of the Microsoft 365 learning pathways.

Title: Creating a Champion Program
Description: Drive adoption of your Office 365 services with these best practices
